title: Audit Log
description: This schema defines Audit Log entity. Audit Log is used to capture audit trail of POST, PUT, and PATCH API operations.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies a Audit Log Entry.

method.description: HTTP Method used in a call.

responseCode.description: HTTP response code for the api requested.

username.description: Name of the user who requested for the API.

date.description: Date which the api call is made.

entity.description: Link to entity on which api request is done.
